sentences: Oren Bloedow (born July 3, 1965) is an American singer, guitarist, and composer.
He founded the band Elysian Fields in 1995 with Jennifer Charles.
His father, Jerry Bloedow is a playwright, poet, and film editor whose theater, the Hardware Poet's Playhouse, participated in the New York avant-garde scene in the 1950s and 1960s.
Bloedow's first musical affiliations were with Phillip Johnston, Bobby Previte, and Wayne Horvitz, all of whom worked with him in Bobby Radcliff's blues band in the 1980s.
In 1985 a friend of Anderson's introduced Bloedow to 101 Crustaceans, whose leader, Ed Pastorini, is Bloedow's oldest continuing musical associate and was a member of Elysian Fields.
In 1990 he began working with Jennifer Charles.
As a solo act he has worked with Elysian Fields, Ed Pastorini, and 101 Crustaceans.
